title: Kabir Singh
short_cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Suresh Oberoi, Arjan Bajwa, Adil Hussain, Nikita Dutta, Kamini Kaushal, Anurag Arora
cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kiara Advani, Suresh Oberoi, Arjan Bajwa, Adil Hussain, Nikita Dutta, Kamini Kaushal, Anurag Arora
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.
